meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>view</kanji> so what is the verb vocab version? It's <vocabulary>to view</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to watch</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading here is actually the same as 見る. This is easy to remember because the meanings are so similar too, not to mention it has a 見 right inside the kanji itself!
